posts.post_content:
All,

I'm going to post these for sale as a GROUP here on net54.  If you have interest in a MAJOR portion of this lot please feel free to contact me ... but these cards are NOT for individual sale.  The prices posted are just an estimation of value ... not a sale price per card.  

Total estimated value for all 271 cards (minor duplication) listed is $17,827.  Asking price for the entire lot including two Cobbs and a PSA6 Baker is $14,500 - a 19% discount for taking them all.  The cards are listed below in order from worst condition to best condition.  Average overall condition is VG to VG+.  Most backs are common but the following backs are also present - PB, Sov, Tolstoi, American Beauty

150 of the lowest condition cards in the lot have just been sold.   about 120 cards remain with nearly all the HOFers and almost every card in vg/ex or better left.  Last chance to purchase before they are sent off the PSA for slabbing..... lot price is now $10k firm.  Please send email for details before Sunday night if you have serious interest.

Best Regards,
Scott.

email: [url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]
